Vendor Terms of Service

Last updated: June 15, 2023

1. Introduction

Welcome to Wanderlust's Vendor Platform. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of Wanderlust's vendor services, including our website, APIs, email notifications, applications, and other services ("Services").

By registering as a vendor, you agree to these Terms. Please read them carefully.

These Terms apply to all vendors, partners, and others who access the Services. If you don't agree to these Terms, you may not use the Services.

2. Vendor Responsibilities

As a vendor on Wanderlust, you agree to:

  • Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration
  • Maintain and promptly update your vendor profile
  • Ensure all package listings are truthful and not misleading
  • Maintain appropriate insurance coverage for all offered services
  • Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
  • Respond to customer inquiries within 24 hours

You are solely responsible for the quality and delivery of your services to customers. Wanderlust acts only as a marketplace platform.

3. Content Ownership

You retain ownership rights in the content you submit to Wanderlust ("Vendor Content"). By submitting Vendor Content, you grant Wanderlust a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to:

  • Use, reproduce, distribute, and display the Vendor Content in connection with the Services
  • Modify the Vendor Content for technical purposes (e.g., formatting)
  • Promote the Vendor Content through marketing channels

You represent and warrant that you have all rights necessary to grant this license and that your Vendor Content doesn't infringe any third-party rights.

4. Payments & Fees

Wanderlust charges vendors a commission fee of 15% on all completed bookings. This fee covers:

  • Platform maintenance and development
  • Customer support services
  • Marketing and promotion
  • Payment processing

Payments to vendors are processed on a bi-weekly basis, minus any applicable fees. Vendors are responsible for:

  • Providing accurate payment information
  • Any taxes associated with your services
  • Any chargebacks or payment disputes

5. Cancellation Policy

Vendors must adhere to the following cancellation policies:

Cancellation Period Refund to Customer Vendor Fee
More than 30 days 100% 5% of total
15-30 days 75% 10% of total
7-14 days 50% 15% of total
Less than 7 days 25% 20% of total

Vendors may set more favorable cancellation terms, but not less favorable than these minimum standards.

6. Privacy & Data

Wanderlust collects and processes personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. As a vendor, you agree to:

  • Comply with all applicable data protection laws
  • Only use customer data for fulfilling bookings
  • Implement appropriate security measures
  • Report any data breaches within 24 hours

You may not sell, share, or otherwise distribute customer data obtained through Wanderlust.

7. Termination

Either party may terminate this agreement with 30 days written notice. Wanderlust may immediately suspend or terminate your account if:

  • You violate these Terms
  • We suspect fraudulent activity
  • Required by law

Upon termination, you must:

  • Fulfill all outstanding bookings
  • Pay any outstanding fees
  • Remove all Wanderlust branding

8. Disputes

Any disputes arising from these Terms will be governed by the laws of India. The parties agree to first attempt to resolve disputes through good faith negotiations.

If a dispute cannot be resolved amicably, it will be submitted to binding arbitration in Bangalore, India. The arbitration will be conducted in English.

Notwithstanding the above, Wanderlust may seek injunctive relief in any court of competent jurisdiction to protect its intellectual property or confidential information.
